WorkItem.ClosedComment: If you need to authenicate to a Proxy, enter the information into your Internet Explorer Connection settings. The programs automatically use those settings.
WorkItem.Description:

The remote server returned an error: (407) Proxy Authentication Required.

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
I attempted to download character information from battle.net
attempted a 2nd time, while Force Refresh is checked
WorkItem.Summary: If behind Proxy, cannot download character information
